about_the_game:
The Rocketbirds original soundtrack compilation includes a selection of 13 tracks by New World Revolution from the "Rocketbirds: Hardboiled Chicken" and "Rocketbirds 2: Evolution" games!

The tracks included inside this compilation are:

01 - Robot
02 - Double Agents
03 - Once I was Lost (Rocketbirds Theme)
04 - Trapped
05 - Illuminate Me (Extended Version)
06 - Galaxies (Extended Version)
07 - The One (Extended Version)
08 - Out Of Focus (Extended Version)
09 - Utopia (Inst. Version)
10 - Once I was Lost (Kurti File PS3 Remix)
11 - Double Agents (Frisch Remix)
12 - Killing Buddha (Reprise)
13 - Once I Was Lost (Instrumental Disco Mix)

name: Rocketbirds OST Compilation
short_description: The Rocketbirds original soundtrack compilation includes a selection of 13 tracks by New World Revolution from the "Rocketbirds: Hardboiled Chicken" and "Rocketbirds 2: Evolution" games!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
